title: Pixel 4 - Dual Sim setup - will it switch to non-default sim if default sim loses connection?
content:
Hi,

I want to start using an eSIM that I have with a carrier that has wider network coverage.  In this scenario I would like to use my default SIM when it has coverage and switch to the eSIM when the default SIM drops out.

Will this switch be transparent from a data perspective or will I need to take manual action to allow the eSIM to be used for data.

Regards
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
